Camera.Flash:: Laser focus, Hasselblad Color Calibration, color spectrum sensor, Dual-LED flash, HDR, panorama
Camera.Second camera:: 50 MP, f/2.8, 85mm (periscope telephoto), 1/2.76", 0.64µm, 3.5x optical zoom, PDAF, OIS

Design.Biometrics:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer
Design.Resistance:: IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

120W wired, PD, QC
50W wireless
10W reverse wireless
5W reverse wired

Display.Features:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer

Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time)
Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM
